---

```{r}
#| echo: false



library(htmltools)

# Include the JavaScript file
htmltools::tagList(
  htmltools::tags$script(src = params$js_file_path)
)
```

```{=html}
<div class="main">
  <div class="container" id="imageContainer">
    <!-- Images will be dynamically added here -->
  </div>
  <div class="attribution">
    created with <a href="https://github.com/luisdva/hexsession" target="_blank">hexsession</a>
  </div>
</div>

<style>
body {
  background-color: var(--bg-color);
  color: var(--text-color);
}

.main {
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  --s: 100px;  /* size */
  --m: 2px;    /* margin */
  --f: calc(1.732 * var(--s) + 4 * var(--m) - 1px);
}

.container {
  font-size: 0; /*disable white space between inline block element */
  max-width: 100%; /* Ensure container doesn't overflow */
}

.container div {
  width: var(--s);
  margin: var(--m);
  height: calc(var(--s)*1.1547); 
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: initial;
  clip-path: polygon(0% 25%, 0% 75%, 50% 100%, 100% 75%, 100% 25%, 50% 0%);
  background: var(--tile-bg);
  margin-bottom: calc(var(--m) - var(--s)*0.2885); 
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.container::before {
  content: "";
  width: calc(var(--s)/2 + var(--m));
  float: left;
  height: 120%;
  shape-outside: repeating-linear-gradient(     
                   #0000 0 calc(var(--f) - 3px),      
                   #000  0 var(--f));
}

.container div img {
  margin: 0;
  max-width: unset;
  max-height: unset;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.container a {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

/* Subtle hover effect */
.container div:hover {
  z-index: 1;
  transform: scale(1.05);  /* Reduced scale */
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);  /* Subtle shadow */
}

.container div:hover img {
  filter: brightness(1.1);  /* Slightly brighten the image */
}

.attribution {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -44px;
  right: 40px;
  font-size: 0.8em;
  color: var(--text-color);
  background-color: var(--attribution-bg);
  padding: 2px 5px;
  border-radius: 3px;
  z-index: 10;
  pointer-events: none;  /* Allows clicking through to underlying elements */
}

.attribution a {
  color: var(--link-color);
  text-decoration: none;
  pointer-events: auto;  /* Re-enables clicking on the link */
}

.attribution a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Media queries for responsiveness */
@media screen and (max-width: 1200px) {
  .main {
    --s: 96px;  /* Slightly reduce size for smaller screens */
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
  .main {
    --s: 80px;  /* Smaller for mobile devices, but still visible */
  }
}

</style>
```
